scripts.dev:chrome: concurrently 'vite build --watch --mode development' 'vite build --config vite.config.contentScript.ts --watch --mode development'
scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && vite build --config vite.config.contentScript.ts
scripts.prodbuild: tsc -b && vite build && vite build --config vite.config.contentScript.ts && rm -rf build/dist && rm build/README.md && mkdir -p build && cp -r dist build/dist && rm -f build/README.md && cp README.md build/
